purpose: Provide an identity layer for managing and personalizing agent interactions in the agentic world.
principle: Builds on LangChain and vector search to manage context and memory for AI agents, enabling personalized interactions.
reusability: Offers APIs for integrating identity and personalization capabilities into existing AI agent frameworks.
limitations: Primarily in alpha stage with potential for rapid changes; may lack comprehensive documentation and stability.
name: honcho
description: The Identity layer for the agentic world
